commands.name: email-student-athletes
commands.title: Email Student Athletes
commands.description: Send templated emails to student athletes via browser automation.

commands.name: create-dropbox-request
commands.title: Create Dropbox Request and Email
commands.subtitle: Dropbox
commands.description: Automates Dropbox file request creation and sends a notification email.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
